text: Ara musarika narike imana na ana paryanta tomara biye karo na [1]. Musarika nari tomaderake mugdha karale'o, abasya'i mumina krtadasi tara ceye uttama. Imana na ana paryanta musarika purusadera sathe tomara biye di'ona [2], musarika purusa tomaderake mugdha karale'o abasya'i mumina kritadasa tara ceye uttama. Tara agunera dike ahabana kare.
